vajra sattvaḥ svayam tedya cakṣu udghāṭana tatparaḥ
tatas tiṣṭha vajra ityādinā śiṣya praveśa mudrām

original: bāhyamaṇḍalābhyantare candramaṇḍalaṃ pūrvadvārābhimukhaṃ saṃlikhya bāhyato vā
analyzed: bāhya maṇḍala abhyantare candra maṇḍalam pūrva dvāra abhimukham saṃlikhya bāhyatas vā

original: śiṣyaṃ śrīvajrahuṃkāramudrayā sattvavajrādibhiś cādhiṣṭhāya mahāmudrayā tataḥ
analyzed: śiṣyam śrī vajra huṃkāra mudrayā sattva vajra ādibhiḥ ca adhiṣṭhāya mahā mudrayā tatas

original: mālagāthābhir abhinandyādau tāvad udakābhiṣekena tato mudrābhiṣekena mukuṭapaṭṭavajrādhipatināmābhiṣekaiś
analyzed: māla gāthābhiḥ abhinandya ādau tāvat udaka abhiṣekena tatas mudrā abhiṣekena mukuṭa paṭṭa vajra adhipati nāma abhiṣekaiḥ
punar puṣpa ādibhiḥ lāsya ādi aṣṭavidha pūjayā ca pūjayet

original: valitavajrāṃjalinā praṇamyottamāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ datvā puṣpadyabhiṣekāś ca grāhyā
analyzed: valita vajra aṃjalinā praṇamya uttamām dakṣiṇām da tvā puṣpadī abhiṣekāḥ ca grāhyā
tu śrī vajra huṃkāra mudrayā tathā eva pratiṣṭhāpya

original: nirdiṣṭeṣu sthāneṣu samayamudrābhis tasya kāye śrīvajrahuṃkārādīn nyasya | punar
analyzed: nirdiṣṭeṣu sthāneṣu samaya mudrābhiḥ tasya kāye śrī vajra huṃkāra ādīn nyasya punar

original: vajrādhipati tvām abhiṣiñcāmi dṛḍho me bhava jaḥ huṃ vaṃ hoḥ huṃ phaṭ iti | tata
analyzed: vajra adhipati tvām abhiṣiñcāmi dṛḍhaḥ me bhava jaḥ hum vaṃ hoḥ hum phaṭ iti tata
iti ca udaka abhiṣekam vajra muṣṭinā udakam

original: vijayakalaśād gṛhītvā dadyād idaṃ ca brūyāt ||
analyzed: vijaya kalaśāt gṛhītvā dadyāt idam ca brūyāt

original: ca mudrāṃ ca yady amaṇḍalino vadet ||
analyzed: ca mudrām ca yadi a maṇḍalinaḥ vadet
vā aśraddha dānena jana saṃgaṇikā sthitaḥ iti
sarva vidhim anuṣṭhāya nāma aṣṭaśatena saṃstutya gāthā pañcakena anujñām
datvā udgata vyākaraṇena sarva śiṣyān sarva śiṣyān vyākuryāt iti
bhavati ācārya abhiṣeka arham praveśya sarva maṇḍalam
parām bhūmim kim punar kṣudra siddhayaḥ
bodhisattva tvam vajra sattva tvam a durlabham iti
siddhiḥ nirjāyate yasya pāpāḥ mahā grahāḥ
vināyakāḥ ca api mṛtyavaḥ māra kāyikāḥ
naśyanti na api jāyante ca mahā uttamā
sa nakṣatrāḥ yaṣāḥ ca api graha ādikāḥ atha
śakra brahma ādayaḥ devāḥ praṇipatya muhur
nānāvidhām kṛtvā ratna chatra ādibhiḥ varām
mahā tīkṣṇaḥ mahā mahān mahā udadhiḥ
vyapī sarva vajra mayaḥ śuciḥ iti yena

original: likhet paṭhed vāpi dhārayed arthataḥ sadā ||
analyzed: likhet paṭhet vā api dhārayet arthataḥ sadā
vā api vajrapāṇi samaḥ bhavet iti idam
sa deva mānuṣa asura gandharva yakṣa sa ādibhiḥ hita sukha prāptaye bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam
ārya sarva durgati pariśodhana tejaḥ rājasya
tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya kalpa eka deśaḥ samāptaḥ
